item.title: Built a PC
item.dc:creator: Vince
item.description: In the year of 2017, I decided to build my first computer. I started doing research online about the steps to build them from the ground up starting with the motherboard, CPU, RAM, GPU, etc. I thought the task of finding the parts was going to be a challenge for me but I discovered a […]
item.content:encoded:
In the year of 2017, I decided to build my first computer. I started doing research online about the steps to build them from the ground up starting with the motherboard, CPU, RAM, GPU, etc. I thought the task of finding the parts was going to be a challenge for me but I discovered a website called TigerDirect that sold bare bone kits that simplified the process. It was a mid-level kit at the time and I found many ways to make improvements to it. I included a CD drive, Blu-ray Drive, 4 TB of storage, and upgraded the GPU once I realized that the one that came in the kit was a few years old and did not support many high end video games.

Wiki

  • Motherboard
  • CPU – Central Processing Unit
  • RAM – Random Access Memory
  • GPU – Graphic Processing Unit
  • CD Drive – Compact Disc Drive
  • Blu-Ray Drive
  • TB – Terabyte
